uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees
Class FieldDocumentTree

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees.FieldDocumentTree
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlockFieldDocumentTree, DICOMFieldDocumentTree
public class FieldDocumentTree
extends java.lang.Object

The binary tree used when we build the direct index with field information.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Douglas Johnson
